script.text: Welcome to Interdimensional Radio, where the waves are as weird as the guests!
Hey Alex, did you just hear that? The portal's humming a new tune.
Hold up—my translator says it’s a remix of 80s synth mixed with alien whale songs.
(interrupting) Guys! I just got a call from the future—someone just ate my lunch.
Classic Zed, always a step ahead… or behind?
Okay, okay, focus! Let’s drop the “wow” moment—
—the universe just sent us a live cameo from a dancing black hole!
(laughs) I always knew gravity had moves.
And for our grand finale—listen to this!
*plays a 5‑second clip of the black hole doing the moonwalk*
If you thought that was wild, wait till you see the next episode.
